tool.name: MentaLiST MLST Analysis

param.name: discard_threshold
param.label: Discard Threshold
param.help: A read of length L is discarded if it has at less than (L - k) * t hits to the same locus in the kmer database, where k is the kmer length. 0 <= t <= 1

param.name: quick_filter
param.label: Quick Filter
param.help: Quick filter; if the first, middle and last kmers of a read are not in the kmer DB, the read is discarded. Disabled by default.

tool.help:
usage: MentaLiST.jl call -o O -s S --db DB [-t T] [-q] [-j J] [-h] files...
positional arguments: files FastQ input files
optional arguments: -o O Output file with MLST call -s S Sample name --db DB Kmer database -t T A read of length L is discarded if it has at less than (L - k) * t hits to the same locus in the kmer database, where k is the kmer length. 0 <= t <= 1 (type: Float64, default: 0.3 -q Quick filter; if the first, middle and last kmers of a read are not in the kmer DB, the read is discarded. Disabled by default. -j J Skip length between consecutive k-mers. Defaults to 1. -h, --help show this help message and exit
